description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office serving the Madhubani district in Bihar, located in the culturally rich Mithila region. The office oversees vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and commercial permits for a vast area including key border towns like Jainagar. It is a key administrative hub for transportation and road safety in Northern Bihar near the Indo-Nepal border.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Bhoop Narayan Singh Colony, Madhubani, Bihar
